title: Image can't be refreshed after importing again
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not being refreshed as expected.
OB: When importing a new 'image1.jpg' into the layout, the original image remains displayed without being updated.
EB: After importing a new 'image1.jpg' into the layout, the expected behavior is that the new image should be displayed, replacing the original one.
SR:
1. Open the layout where you want to import the image.
2. Import the new 'image1.jpg' into the layout again.
